org.apache.flink.runtime.webmonitor

类 WebRuntimeMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.webmonitor.WebRuntimeMonitor
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    WebMonitor

    public class WebRuntimeMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements WebMonitor
    The root component of the web runtime monitor. This class starts the web server and creates all request handlers for the REST API.

    The web runtime monitor is based in Netty HTTP. It uses the Netty-Router library to route HTTP requests of different paths to different response handlers. In addition, it serves the static files of the web frontend, such as HTML, CSS, or JS files.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getJsonArchivists

        public static JsonArchivist[] getJsonArchivists()
        Returns an array of all JsonArchivists that are relevant for the history server.

        This method is static to allow easier access from the MemoryArchivist. Requiring a reference would imply that the WebRuntimeMonitor is always created before the archivist, which may not hold for all deployment modes.

        Similarly, no handler implements the JsonArchivist interface itself but instead contains a separate implementing class; otherwise we would either instantiate several handlers even though their main functionality isn't required, or yet again require that the WebRuntimeMonitor is started before the archivist.

        返回:
        array of all JsonArchivists relevant for the history server

      • start

        public void start()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: WebMonitor
        Starts the web monitor.
        指定者:
        start 在接口中 WebMonitor

      • getServerPort

        public int getServerPort()
        从接口复制的说明: WebMonitor
        Gets the port that the web server actually binds to. If port 0 was given in the configuration, then a random free port will be picked. This method can be used to determine this port.
        指定者:
        getServerPort 在接口中 WebMonitor
        返回:
        The port where the web server is listening, or -1, if no server is running.

      • getRestAddress

        public java.lang.String getRestAddress()

        指定者:
        getRestAddress 在接口中 WebMonitor
        返回:
        REST address of this WebMonitor

        private void get(org.apache.flink.shaded.netty4.io.netty.handler.codec.http.router.Router router,
                 RequestHandler handler)
        These methods are used in the route path setup. They register the given RequestHandler or RuntimeMonitorHandler with the given Router for the respective REST method. The REST paths under which they are registered are defined by the handlers.

      • checkAndCreateUploadDir

        public static void checkAndCreateUploadDir(java.io.File uploadDir)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Checks whether the given directory exists and is writable. If it doesn't exist this method will attempt to create it.
        参数:
        uploadDir - directory to check
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if the directory does not exist and cannot be created, or if the directory isn't writable
